doc.title: Empfindungen
doc.plot: The film tells the story of a woman who lives alone in a wild and untamed environment, apparently with neither fixed habits nor acknowledgement of conventional behaviour. Her feelings and sensory impressions are dictated by the landscape that both surrounds her and holds her prisoner. She feels neither good nor bad. She has no comparisons, but she does have dreams. Suddenly a man appears. Too much is demanded of her, she has no idea how she should behave, she has very strong feelings which seem to be convincing to him too... (Lisi Frischengruber)
